page.title: 18ST.NICHOLAS C.P. 2
page.content: {Long Sutton and Sutton Bridge.}When children leave St.Nicholas C.P. Lutton,to go to secondary school, they either go to The Peele Secondary School,Lutton;Spalding Grammar School for boys;Spalding High School for girls.Some children choose to go to the convent school in Wisbech, others to the Sir John Gleed High Schools in Spalding.Which ever secondary school children attend,there is generally a long bus journey involved,those children travelling to Spalding from Lutton Marsh leave home at 7.40 a.m. and return home at approximately 5.00p.m.In winter this journey can take much longer because of the remote nature of the countryside,and quite often days at school are missed because school transport is unable to run.
